definitions.definition: To wish for with eagerness; to desire possession of, often enviously .
To long for inordinately or unlawfully; to hanker after (something forbidden).
To yearn ; to have or indulge an inordinate desire, especially for another's possession.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To wish for with eagerness; to desire possession of, often enviously .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To long for inordinately or unlawfully; to hanker after (something forbidden).
( intransitive ) To yearn ; to have or indulge an inordinate desire, especially for another's possession.
